name: Kelsi Davies: Haunt Escape
description: There are many stories down here in Moonlight Tunnel... Anyone who has ever dared to enter this tunnel, has been approached by demons, spirits, and strange cults who lurk in the darkness. In 1915 a young girl named May got lost in these tunnels. In 1984 a family crashed above the tunnels. It is believed that the entire family haunts these tunnels. Find all five spirits, and communicate with them, possibly helping them move on with their unfinished business.
